title: Bethune
creator_credit: Donald Brittain, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A documentary on the life of Dr Norman Bethune, who opened up Spain’s first blood bank during the Spanish Civil War, and went to China where he acted as doctor on the famous “long march”. Using graphic film clips, stills and interviews with colleagues Dr Bethune’s legendary career is presented.
